name: FPS Survival War:City Shooter
description:
FPS Survival War:City Shooter is army based first person shooting game as the user leads the army and group of soldiers in the battlefield as user gets the ultimate chance to become a sniper commando assassin and serve the nation.
Features:
• Action filled thrill with fps game
• Simple, user friendly and smooth gameplay control
• Immersive shooter HD graphics
• Various weapons and guns to choose
• Plenty of shooting missions to keep you entertain
• Real HD sound effects
